Unnamed Group of People.Sourced Statement: We had a job fair in the middle of a heat wave and there was still a line going out of the door.
Unnamed Group of People.Source Justification: illustrating demand for jobs at Tobyhanna Army Depot

Unnamed Group of People.Sourced Statement: We had another one when it was pouring rain, and the same thing happened.
Unnamed Group of People.Source Justification: illustrating demand for jobs at Tobyhanna Army Depot; same as previous

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: We’re all about quality jobs, and that’s a quality organization.
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: President and Chief Executive Officer of the Scranton Chamber of Commerce
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: representing the interests of the Scranton Chamber of Commerce

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: It’s not $277 million that stays here. But, you know, it’s a good chunk of it.
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: representing Scranton and Northeastern Pennsylvania, providing context on economic impact

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: I don’t really think that people dwell or concentrate on anything that’s going on outside of their sphere of influence.
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: Commander’s Representative at the Scranton Army Ammunition Plant
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: providing insight into the focus of workers at the plant

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: We had a job fair in the middle of a heat wave and there was still a line going out of the door.
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: Lead Public Affairs Specialist at the Tobyhanna Army Depot
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: highlighting the popularity of jobs at the depot

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: With the Ukraine support, you know, one day I was sitting there thinking about what needs to be done, and it kind of hit me that what we were doing directly affects whether people live or die.
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: Senior Technology Center Engineer at the Tobyhanna Army Depot
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: sharing personal perspective on the impact of their work

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: At the height of last year’s counteroffensive, the Ukrainians were firing about 6,000 a day,
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: Senior Advisor at the Center for Strategic and International Studies
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: providing expert analysis on Ukraine’s military needs

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: Our first task is to save our people.
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: Commander of a Ukrainian Artillery Unit
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: highlighting Ukraine’s priorities in the conflict

Named Organization Sources.Sourced Statement: The U.S. Army was making 14,000 artillery shells a month prior to the conflict.
Named Organization Sources.Source Justification: context on production levels before and after the conflict

Named Organization Sources.Sourced Statement: The Biden administration announced this month it would be sending an additional $250 million dollars worth of new military aid to Ukraine, including air defense missiles and 155mm howitzer rounds.
Named Organization Sources.Source Justification: reporting on recent developments in U.S. aid to Ukraine

Named Organization Sources.Sourced Statement: The Tobyhanna Army Depot... estimates that the company has a $2.4 billion dollar impact on the area and that it is the largest industrial employer in the region.
Named Organization Sources.Source Justification: highlighting the depot’s economic significance to the area

Named Organization Sources.Sourced Statement: Lockheed Martin and other military contractors... have become a vital part of the economy of Northeastern Pennsylvania.
